Blackjack

Class Wallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Blackjack.Wallet

  • public class Wallet
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that simulates a player's wallet for betting.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bet
      The current amount set as a bet.
      private int money
      The amount of money in the wallet.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wallet()
      Default constructor, sets money in wallet to $100.
      Wallet(int money)
      Constructor that takes input value to set money in wallet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustBetForBlackjack()
      Method that adjusts bet to 150% of the original bet.
      int getBet()
      Get the current bet.
      int getMoney()
      Get the amount of money in the wallet.
      void modifyMoney(int amount)
      Add or remove money from the wallet.
      void resetBet()
      Reset the bet to 0.
      void setBet(int bet)
      Sets the bet.
      int transferMoney(int amount)
      Transfer money out of a wallet.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • money

        private int money
        The amount of money in the wallet.

      • bet

        private int bet
        The current amount set as a bet. This amount is added to 'money' if a bet is won or taken away otherwise.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wallet

        public Wallet(int money)
        Constructor that takes input value to set money in wallet.
        Parameters:
        money - Amount of money to start with in wallet.
        Throws:
        NegativeMoneyException - When starting money is less than 0.

      • Wallet

        public Wallet()
        Default constructor, sets money in wallet to $100.

    • Method Detail

      • setBet

        public void setBet(int bet)
        Sets the bet.
        Parameters:
        bet - Amount to set the bet to.
        Throws:
        InvalidBetException - When bet is less than 1.
        BetTooBigException - When the bet exceeds amount of money available.

      • getMoney

        public int getMoney()
        Get the amount of money in the wallet.
        Returns:
        How much money is in the wallet.

      • getBet

        public int getBet()
        Get the current bet.
        Returns:
        The amount of money being bet.

      • adjustBetForBlackjack

        public void adjustBetForBlackjack()
        Method that adjusts bet to 150% of the original bet. Used when a player wins with Blackjack (2 cards valued at 21).

      • modifyMoney

        public void modifyMoney(int amount)
        Add or remove money from the wallet.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to be added/removed. Can not be bigger than the amount of money available.
        Throws:
        NegativeMoneyException - When amount to subtract exceeds the amount available.

      • transferMoney

        public int transferMoney(int amount)
        Transfer money out of a wallet.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to attempt to remove. If the amount is too big, the rest of the money in the wallet will be taken.
        Returns:
        Amount taken from the wallet.
        Throws:
        NegativeAmountException - When the 'amount' parameter is negative.

      • resetBet

        public void resetBet()
        Reset the bet to 0.
